txt.en: Instance: Too Far From the City
You have found Faramir, but the young captain is hard-pressed on all sides!
Talk to Gandalf on the Pelennor
Ride for the gates of Minas Tirith
'Faramir has fallen!'

'I do not know you, stranger, but I can tell by your livery you are a friend! My men and I must reach the White City, but we were pursued. Southrons harry us on foot and on horseback, and terrible wraiths attack from the skies!\n\n'Fight them off, my friend! We must reach the city, if we can!'
'There is someone off the road!'
'Captain Faramir!'
'Faramir has sustained a wound, [placeholder]. Soon the enemy will surround us... he cannot stay here.\n\n'Ride for the city! I will follow with Faramir and Prince Imrahil. Go now!'
'For Gondor! For Faramir!'
The time has come for you to ride to Minas Tirith, but the enemy will be close on your heels.
You can hear the sound of fighting ahead of you, in the middle of the Pelennor. Someone needs your help!
A dart flies right by your head, missing by inches, and then another!
DNT - Blah!
Faramir, Captain of Gondor, is beset on all sides by the forces of the enemy! You must help him reach Minas Tirith!
Faramir has fallen from his horse! He seems to have suffered a terrible injury.
Gandalf has crossed the field in the company of Prince Imrahil and his swan-knights, and he motions for you to speak with him.
Ride across the Pelennor toward Minas Tirith
Talk to Faramir on the Pelennor Fields
Fight alongside Faramir, Captain of Gondor
Gandalf has commanded you to ride for the city of Minas Tirith, while he follows with Prince Imrahil and the wounded Faramir.
'Ride for the city!'
Fight alongside Faramir, Captain of Gondor
'[placeholder]!'
'The enemy draws near! Fight!'
Stand beside Faramir, and defend him from his foes
'The White Rider!'
'We must help them!'
You have come to Minas Tirith in time!
Faramir has fallen!
